TEXT.TITLE: CHRYSLER <C> NON-PROFIT GROUP SELLS UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Chrysler Corp's Chrysler Motors Corp said its Chrysler Training Corp non-profit organization sold the name and assets of its Motech Auto Mechanic and Body Shop Schools to O/E Corp of Troy, Mich. The sale price was not disclosed. Under the Internal Revenue Service code, proceeds from the sale of Motech must be donated to another tax-exempt nonprofit organization. Chrysler did not reveal the name of the group that received the proceeds. Reuter
